Html: Is there possibly be a way to have the 3.3PTR check box also use the changed 3.3 spriest glyphs, shadow, sw:p and now mind flay are all very different now

Don't worry too much about that, just use 3.2.2 Glyphs as they are in 3.2.2. If you select 3.3 PTR it will put Glyph of Shadow to 30% of your Spirit, only thing missing is Glyph of Shadow Word: Pain mana regen (which is about 64mp5 with 0 haste)
